label: Tab-1
content: Create buttons to open specific tab content. All <div> elements with class=tabcontent are hidden by default (with CSS & JS). When the user clicks on a button - it will open the tab content that matches this button.

label: Tab-2
content: To open a specific tab on page load, use JavaScript to click on the specified tab button

label: Tab-3
content: If you want to close a specific tab, use JavaScript to hide the tab with a click of a button
